metadata.name: Close But No Cigar
metadata.description:
NiftyFilm Classics presents an oldie but a goodie!

From the acclaimed Upstart Film Collective comes the true story of a man who thought he was above the law.

A businessman thinks he has discovered the find of a lifetime when he purchases a box of some of the rarest cigars in the world. Determined to double-down on his fortune, he insures them against fire, and the insurance company is forced to pay after he smokes every single last one of them. The salesman, however, thinks he knows a way for the man to get his just desserts...

See the film Mark Twain called "a legend," and a tale that "could have happened."
